item.title: Software Review: Joplin
item.description: Joplin is a popular open-source note-taking application. I have been using Joplin for over a year now and here is my review:

item.title: Interesting old websites and ways to archive online content
item.description: Oldest website - http://info.cern.ch/hypertext/WWW/TheProject.html Search engine for old websites - https://wiby.me Interesting old website archives https://wakaba.c3.cx/shii/shiichan http://tanasinn.info/wiki/Main_Page https://github.com/bibanon/bibanon/wiki/2channel https://wiki.bibanon.org/4chan/History - History of 4chan Find website archives online https://archive.
